title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: When the user tries to perform a "Build" action, the button for this action is enabled even if a build has already been done. This behavior is incorrect and needs to be fixed.
OB: The "Build" button is enabled even after a build has been completed.
EB: The "Build" button should be disabled if a build has already been done.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Perform a build.
2. Check if the "Build" button is still enabled.

Expected behavior:
The "Build" button should be disabled after a build has already been done.
